Module com.example.cs230
Package CS230.saveload

Class ProfileFileManager

java.lang.Object
CS230.saveload.ProfileFileManager
public class ProfileFileManager extends Object
Class for saving the current state of the program and seeing if the player is new or not and what levels they have unlocked
Version:
1.0
Author:
Marek Jezinski, Tom Stevens
